channel.title: [317]PKing4Funscape[377] Realistic GW & PC
channel.description:
Hello everyone i am going to be showing off the server i have been working on!
[b]Here are some pics:[/b]
I will Start off with God Wars -Created Entirely by me [img]http://img7.imageshack.us/img7/5105/gwbandos.png[/img] Bandos [img]http://img7.imageshack.us/img7/2995/gwarmadyl.png[/img] Armadyl [img]http://img6.imageshack.us/img6/8992/gwsaradomin.png[/img] Commander something (for Saradomin) [b] GW Starting area[/b] [img]http://img7.imageshack.us/img7/2577/gw1.png[/img] You kill to get kills who would have guessed
[img]http://img88.imageshack.us/img88/9941/gw11.png[/img] You need ten kills to use the portals
[b]Now for Pest Control:[/b] [img]http://img90.imageshack.us/img90/464/pcboat.png[/img] You enter boat and you have to wait 300 seconds before everyone in the boat gets sent to the island I am going to make it so you need to have at least 5 players to start the game. [img]http://img6.imageshack.us/img6/7922/inpc.png[/img] Each portal randomly spawns PC NPCs according to how many players are playing will soon add an interface for this too! If you win you get only so many points and if you lose you get 1 Here is what you can spend your points on! [img]http://img6.imageshack.us/img6/4024/pcreward1.png[/img] [img]http://img6.imageshack.us/img6/7119/pcreward2.png[/img] [b] Jad:[/b] [img]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/2963/jad.png[/img] I removed the waves because everyone hated them in my last server
[b]Jail:[/b] [img]http://img90.imageshack.us/img90/917/jail.png[/img] Complete with Guards and Guard dogs! The door to the cell opens but you cant walk out :P [b] Home:[/b] I will post more pics later
The home is on the coast so there are quite a few boats around here is one! [img]http://img88.imageshack.us/img88/6715/disle1.png[/img] Which takes you to WaterBirth isle and in the cave you will find [img]http://img27.imageshack.us/img27/7673/waterbirthislerex.png[/img]
Now for the skills: [img]http://img27.imageshack.us/img27/2237/workingskills.png[/img] Magic: 2/3rd Have yet to get around to adding Lunar All of these skills work allmost 100%
[img]http://img90.imageshack.us/img90/8021/notworkingskills.png[/img] Summoning: I have a ok base for it need a bit of work! Agility: Need to add a area for this as work on the actual code it self Thieving: Have stalls at home but still need some more work Prayer: it dosent work like it should i really need to work on this Fire Making: I just threw it out everything was every where and i really didnt have a reason so i just took it out. I am actually thinking about having a guy you kick in the nutz to get 99 fire making!
[b]Some Custom Items:[/b] Here is a list and some pics of the new items in my server [img]http://img14.imageshack.us/img14/4107/121items.png[/img] [img]http://img27.imageshack.us/img27/8936/armors.png[/img]
[b]Item List:[/b] [code] [u]Skill Capes:[/u] ID: 4315 = Attack ID: 4317 = Attack(t) ID: 4319 = Strength ID: 4321 = Strength(t) ID: 4323 = Defence ID: 4325 = Defence(t) ID: 4327 = Range ID: 4329 = Range(t) ID: 4331 = Prayer ID: 4333 = Prayer(t) ID: 4335 = Magic ID: 4337 = Magic(t) ID: 4339 = Fire Making ID: 4341 = Fire Making(t) ID: 4343 = Rune Crafting ID: 4345 = Rune Crafting(t) ID: 4347 = Hitpoint ID: 4349 = Hitpoint(t) ID: 4351 = Agility ID: 4353 = Agility(t) ID: 4355 = N/A ID: 4357 = Herblore ID: 4359 = Herblore(t) ID: 4361 = Thieving ID: 4363 = Thieving(t) ID: 4365 = Crafting ID: 4367 = Crafting(t) ID: 4369 = Fletching ID: 4371 = Fletching(t) ID: 4373 = Slayer ID: 4375 = Slayer(t) ID: 4377 = Mining ID: 4379 = Mining(t) ID: 4381 = Smithing ID: 4383 = Smithing(t) ID: 4385 = Fishing ID: 4387 = Fishing(t) ID: 4389 = Cooking ID: 4391 = Cooking(t) ID: 4393 = Wood Cutting ID: 4395 = Wood Cutting(t) ID: 4397 = Farming ID: 4399 = Farming(t) ID: 4401 = Quest ID: 4403 = Const. ID: 4405 = Const.(t) ID: 4407 = Hunter ID: 4409 = Hunter(t) ID: 4411 = Summoning ID: 4413 = Summoning(t)
[u]Skill Cape Hoods:[/u] will post back soon
[u]Void Knight:[/u] ID: 636 = Void knight Top ID: 646 = Void knight skirt ID: 2902 = Void knight gloves ID: 1277 = Void knight mace ID: 656 = Void Mage Helm ID: 662 = Void Ranger Helm ID: 655 = Void Melee Helm
[u]3rd Age Armor[/u] ID: 660 = 3rd age Range coif ID: 640 = 3rd age Range top ID: 650 = 3rd age Range bottom ID: 2912 = 3rd age Vambraces ID: 664 = 3rd age Mage hat ID: 644 = 3rd age Mage top ID: 654 = 3rd age Mage bottom Id: 4905 = 3rd age Full helm Id: 639 = 3rd age Platebody Id: 649 = 3rd age Platelegs Id: 1171 = 3rd age Kiteshield
[u]God Armor:[/u] Id: 643 = Bandos Tasset Id: 653 = Bandos Chestplate Id: 4310 = Bandos Boots Id: 1321 = Bandos Scimatar Id: 1189 = Bandos kiteshield Id: 4907 = Armadyl helm Id: 2896 = Armadyl Chestplate Id: 2908 = Armadyl plateskirt
[u]Misc:[/u] Id: 1155 = Dragon Full helm Id: 882 = Dragon arrow Id: 4119 = Dragon Boots Id: 4917 = Dragon platebody 1
Id: 1117 = Varrock Armour 1 Id: 1115 = Varrock Armour 2 Id: 1119 = Varrock Armour 3 Id: 1422 = Barrelchest Anchor Id: 4119 = Dragon Boots Id: 1153 = Helm Of neitiznot
Id: 839 = DarkBow Id: 4919 = Fighter Torso Id: 1173 = Rune Defender Id: 757 = Book Id: 1139 = Granite helm Id: 4918 = Granite body Id: 1337 = Gnarly Waraxe -Ripped from his Gnarly Client[/code]
O yah and i used Allstar-Scape as a base so none of the mini games were even on it. I also removed alot of this skills as they were very suckish and redid them myself . I will be updating Later
P.S. If you dont like it dont even post or post some constructive criticism please I will add to this when i find the time too

item.title: [317]PKing4Funscape[377] Realistic GW & PC
item.dc:creator: @Jeremy368 Jeremy368
item.description:
@Jeremy368 wrote:

Hello everyone i am going to be showing off the server i have been working on!

Here are some pics:

I will Start off with God Wars -Created Entirely by me

Bandos

Armadyl

Commander something (for Saradomin)

GW Starting area

You kill to get kills who would have guessed


You need ten kills to use the portals

Now for Pest Control:

You enter boat and you have to wait 300 seconds before everyone in the boat gets sent to the island
I am going to make it so you need to have at least 5 players to start the game.

Each portal randomly spawns PC NPCs according to how many players are playing
will soon add an interface for this too! If you win you get only so many points and if you lose you get 1 Here is what you can spend your points on!



Jad:

I removed the waves because everyone hated them in my last server

Jail:

Complete with Guards and Guard dogs!
The door to the cell opens but you cant walk out

Home:
I will post more pics later

The home is on the coast so there are quite a few boats around here is one!

Which takes you to WaterBirth isle and in the cave you will find

Now for the skills:

Magic: 2/3rd Have yet to get around to adding Lunar
All of these skills work allmost 100%


Summoning: I have a ok base for it need a bit of work!
Agility: Need to add a area for this as work on the actual code it self
Thieving: Have stalls at home but still need some more work
Prayer: it dosent work like it should i really need to work on this
Fire Making: I just threw it out everything was every where and i really didnt have a reason so i just took it out. I am actually thinking about having a guy you kick in the nutz to get 99 fire making!

Some Custom Items:
Here is a list and some pics of the new items in my server

Item List:
